sentences.en: Leather grinding machine to undertake major repairs, Screed drum machine and machine Screed Huixiu.
sentences.cn: 承接大修磨革机, 熨平机及熨平机滚筒回修.

sentences.en: Screed concrete without a wet screed crew, and screed it more precisely!
sentences.cn: 熨平不湿混凝土找平船员, 和熨平板更精确!

sentences.en: Screed was ultimately killed by Warlord Zsinj during his rise to power.
sentences.cn: 斯克里德便是其中之一.

sentences.en: The pro - whaling screed was approved by a much thinner margin : 33 votes to 32.
sentences.cn: 上一次关于捕鲸的冗长决议是以33票对32票的微弱 差数 通过的.
那篇冗长的演说使听众厌烦了。

sentences.en: Though Screed was not initially impressed with such brutish methods, he kept an open mind.
sentences.cn: 斯克里德虽然一开始对这种野蛮的做法不以为然, 但也并不介意.

trans.tran_cn: 冗长的文章，长篇大论，（定墙上灰泥厚薄的）准条，匀泥尺
trans.tran_en: a long or prolonged speech or piece of writing
